title: Cornish and Wright letter on Colonization-evidence

content.question: What evidence do the authors provide to show their opposition to the American Colonization Society?

choices.label: The American Colonization Society needed more input from white abolitionists in order to be taken seriously.
The American Colonization Society needed more support from independent African states to be successful.
The American Colonization Society was created by enslavers to force Blacks out of the United States.
The American Colonization Society was founded before there was a law that abolished slavery in the United States.

content.answer: The American Colonization Society was created by enslavers to force Blacks out of the United States.
